thread.section_title: First Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic hotel
thread.title_full: Fantastic hotel - Review of First Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Robert M
title: Fantastic hotel
text:
We (my girlfriend and I) stayed here for three days in late March and loved it. Everyone from the front desk to the cleaning staff to the breakfast service was extremely accommodating. Our room had a direct view of the Eiffel Tower looked phenomenal at night. If we go back to Paris we will definitely go back here.
Room Tip: It seemed a bit small at first glance but once we got everything settled it was quite nice and roomi... See more room tips
